title: Add home page links section, rename Mission tab, add delete functionality, and create Additional Resources tab

requirements.text: Rename the 'Mission' navigation tab to 'Overview' throughout the application

quotes: edit the "mission" tab title. Use "overview" instead

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu displays 'Overview' instead of 'Mission'
Tab routing continues to work correctly with the renamed tab
Active tab highlighting works for the Overview tab

requirements.text: Add a new 'Additional Resources' tab to the navigation menu and create corresponding page component

quotes: add an additional tab. Call it "Additional Resources"

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu includes 'Additional Resources' as a new tab option
Clicking the tab navigates to a new Additional Resources page
Page follows the existing design system and layout patterns

requirements.text: Add a section on the home page below the mission text for displaying links with thumbnails

quotes: add a place for links and thumbnails on the home page
below the text on the home page, let me add links and thumbnails

acceptanceCriteria: New section appears below the mission content on the home page
Section displays links with associated thumbnail images
Links open in new tabs when clicked
Thumbnails are displayed in a responsive grid layout

requirements.text: Create backend data model and CRUD operations for home page links with thumbnails

quotes: add a place for links and thumbnails on the home page

acceptanceCriteria: New data type defined for home page links with title, URL, and thumbnail fields
CRUD functions implemented for adding, updating, retrieving, and deleting links
Thumbnail images stored using blob storage pattern consistent with existing image handling

requirements.text: Add dialog component for creating and editing home page links with thumbnail upload

quotes: let me add links and thumbnails

acceptanceCriteria: Dialog allows input of link title and URL
Thumbnail image upload with progress tracking using ExternalBlob pattern
Form validation for required fields
Success and error toast notifications on save

requirements.text: Add delete button and functionality to all article posts in Latest Progress section

quotes: add a "delete" button everywhere there's a post. Want to be able to delete posts, pictures, links, etc if needed

acceptanceCriteria: Delete button visible on each article card
Clicking delete shows confirmation dialog
Successfully deleted articles are removed from the list
Backend deleteArticle function implemented and working

requirements.text: Add delete button and functionality to all X Posts

quotes: add a "delete" button everywhere there's a post. Want to be able to delete posts, pictures, links, etc if needed

acceptanceCriteria: Delete button visible on each X post card
Clicking delete shows confirmation dialog
Successfully deleted posts are removed from the gallery
Backend deleteXPost function implemented and working

requirements.text: Add delete functionality for home page links with thumbnails

quotes: add a "delete" button everywhere there's a post. Want to be able to delete posts, pictures, links, etc if needed

acceptanceCriteria: Delete button visible on each home page link card
Clicking delete shows confirmation dialog
Successfully deleted links are removed from the home page
Backend delete function for home page links implemented and working

constraints: All existing content across all sections must be preserved during implementation
Do not modify existing data structures in ways that would cause data loss
Maintain consistent delete confirmation UI pattern across all sections
